entity_id.description: An identifier for use with projectiles spawned through this entity action. For use with [Custom Entity Id (Entity Condition Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/custom_projectile).
entity_id.markdownDescription: An identifier for use with projectiles spawned through this entity action. For use with [Custom Entity Id (Entity Condition Type)](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/custom_projectile).

texture_location.description: If specified, the texture used for the custom projectile.
texture_location.markdownDescription: If specified, the texture used for the custom projectile.

texture_url.description: If specified, the url to a .png file imported into the game as a texture for this power's use. This will be used as a fallback if `texture_location` is not specified or if a texture is not present.
texture_url.markdownDescription: If specified, the url to a .png file imported into the game as a texture for this power's use. This will be used as a fallback if `texture_location` is not specified or if a texture is not present.

count.description: The amount of projectiles to fire each use.
count.markdownDescription: The amount of projectiles to fire each use.

speed.description: The speed applied to the fired projectile.
speed.markdownDescription: The speed applied to the fired projectile.

divergence.description: How much each projectile fired is affected by random spread.
divergence.markdownDescription: How much each projectile fired is affected by random spread.

sound.description: If set, the sound with this ID will be played when the power is used.
sound.markdownDescription: If set, the sound with this ID will be played when the power is used.

entity_action_before_firing.description: If specified, the entity action to execute on the entity firing the projectile just prior to the projectile being created.
entity_action_before_firing.markdownDescription: If specified, the entity action to execute on the entity firing the projectile just prior to the projectile being created.

bientity_action_after_firing.description: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner the actor, and the projectile as the target as soon as the projectile is created.
bientity_action_after_firing.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner the actor, and the projectile as the target as soon as the projectile is created.

block_action_on_hit.description: If specified, the block action to execute on the block the projectile lands on upon having it land on it.
block_action_on_hit.markdownDescription: If specified, the block action to execute on the block the projectile lands on upon having it land on it.

bientity_action_on_miss.description: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner as the actor, and the projectile as the target upon missing.
bientity_action_on_miss.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner as the actor, and the projectile as the target upon missing.

bientity_action_on_hit.description: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile as the actor, and the hit entity as the target upon hitting an entity.
bientity_action_on_hit.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile as the actor, and the hit entity as the target upon hitting an entity.

owner_target_bientity_action_on_hit.description: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner as the actor, and the hit entity as the target upon hitting an entity.
owner_target_bientity_action_on_hit.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity action to execute with the projectile owner as the actor, and the hit entity as the target upon hitting an entity.

block_action_cancels_miss_action.description: Determines if the `block_action_on_hit` action will cancel the `bientity_action_on_miss` action.
block_action_cancels_miss_action.markdownDescription: Determines if the `block_action_on_hit` action will cancel the `bientity_action_on_miss` action.

block_condition.description: If specified, the block condition that the block targeted by the `block_action_on_hit` field must meet in order for that to run.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the block condition that the block targeted by the `block_action_on_hit` field must meet in order for that to run.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the bi-entity condition with the projectile as the actor and the target as the target for the projectile to actually hit the target instead of pass through.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity condition with the projectile as the actor and the target as the target for the projectile to actually hit the target instead of pass through.

owner_bientity_condition.description: If specified, the bi-entity condition with the projectile owner as the actor and the target as the target for the projectile to actually hit the target instead of pass through.
owner_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity condition with the projectile owner as the actor and the target as the target for the projectile to actually hit the target instead of pass through.

tick_bientity_action.description: If specified, the bi-entity action with the projectile owner as the actor, and the projectile as the target that is run each tick of the projectile's lifespan.
tick_bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, the bi-entity action with the projectile owner as the actor, and the projectile as the target that is run each tick of the projectile's lifespan.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to.
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_type.md)

Fires a projectile that is customisable by the fields of the entity action type.

Type ID: `apugli:custom_projectile`
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_type.md)

Fires a projectile that is customisable by the fields of the entity action type.

Type ID: `apugli:custom_projectile`
